author: roberto.bayardo
content: Mempools could require >= datagas from the new tx for replacement/cancelation, preventing canceling an n-blob tx with a 1 or 0 blob tx.  I also like the idea of only 1 pending blob tx per account. I think those two conditions resolve the DoS concerns and they are easy to implement.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Another improvement would be for Eth/68 to announce the # of blobs instead of (or in addition to) the tx type. (Some discussion on this latter point here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-4844-shard-blob-transactions/8430/28)
